6+ years of overall experience with at least 3+ years as a Big Data DevOps / Release EngineerExpert level experience in Software Configuration Management (SCM) and Build tools such as Git, GitLab, Nexus, Maven, Grunt and Node.js.Demonstrated experience in many of these technologies - Jenkins, Ansible, Terraform, Puppet, Docker, Kubernetes orchestration and similar technologiesDemonstrated experience involving automating builds, release and configuration management system of non-prod and production environments using RPMs and scripting languages like Perl, Python, Bash and Groovy.Good knowledge in Querying and analyzing large amount of data on Hadoop HDFS using Hive and Spark Streaming and working on systems like HDFS, YARN, Hive, HBase.
